name: Lose the Trail
book: Pathfinder Campaign Setting: Inner Sea Gods © 2014, Paizo Publishing, LLC
text: The target or targets of this spell can obscure their tracks when fleeing from a pursuer. This increases the DC of any Survival checks made to track the spell's targets by 2 per level of the caster.
savingThrow_zh: 意志, 通过则无效 (无害)
text_zh: 这个法术可以帮助受术者在逃避追击时抹去他可能留下的所有痕迹。任何追踪者试图追迹受术者的生存技能检定DC会增加（每施法者等级+2）。
